document.full_text: most people look forward to their 60s and 70s as retirement years, but jodie foster expects to be acting during that time of her life in something of a career rebirth.
document.title: "beaver" maker jodie foster sees more directing ahead
lines_and_colors: most people look forward to their 60s and 70s as retirement years, but jodie foster expects to be acting during that time of her life in something of a career rebirth.
